[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f15f16368724142000321#post_559f15f16368724142000321
I suppose so. Kinda makes me feel like a  pathetic total loser every time I talk about it.

And I should note this is just me, not an accusation.


Any recommendation?[/bq]
If you ever feel like a loser about complaining about sjw remember this: third wave feminists have *LITERALLY* (not metaphorically) wasted over $100,000,000 on getting upset that people say bad things about them on the internet instead of using that money to fund women going to college.

To me spending $100million combined towards trying to stop people from saying negative things about you on the internet is the ultimate definition of someone being a complete loser.
